The school had made enough efforts to make the punishment an authoritarian sanction. The school made an effort but not enough to be ignored by higher authorities. Sanctions were taken lightly considering efforts made by the school to avoid this from happening. The sanction was not enforced, and the school had to take a harsh approach that meant that the school had to be stricter, which was a punishment to the school.

### Input for an answer:

### Sanctions were a punishing blow

A punishing blow is a harsh approach that does not make it worth the school taking the sanction itself. Sanctions in this case were taken by the school so as to make the administration enforce stricter rules. The administration’s response was authoritarian and enforced rules. The sanction was taken too harsh and was deemed unreasonable to the school and the administration.
### Answers:

### A: ignored

The sanction was ignored because the administration felt it was too harsh and would hurt the school to continue its efforts. The administration was lenient and would not enforce the rules for the school.
### B: enforce

The sanction in this case was taken too lightly and was not authoritarian enough to be enforced upon the school for its actions. Enforce is used because the school would have to take steps to ensure the sanction would have to be enforced upon it.
### C: authoritarian

The sanctions in this case were authoritarian, and the school felt it was too harst and did no longer need to make efforts because the sanctions were enforced upon them. The school did not need to take authoritative steps towards making efforts because the sanction was harsh enough to be enforced by the administration.

You’ve got a good instinct for fashion but you must work on your fashion vocab. A boutique is a small shop that sells small quantities of clothes while a jewelry boutique refers to a store or a room within a store that offers jewelry of all types. A jewelry box is a case usually a small decorative wooden box of the type used for holding or storing jewelry. To locate the choker in these three places you will need to use your instinct and your knowledge of what jewelry that is found in what place, in the case of the jewelry box and the jewelry boutiques. Your instinct can serve you as well as the three examples. You now have your answer as to where to locate the choker.

 

### Input-Response:He fantasied about getting what while driving to work, the pros and cons of getting the extra responsibilities, the extra benefits of the extra rewards? Choices: 

Answer: He fantasied of becoming a supervisor. This would give him the opportunity to have extra responsibilities in that he would supervise everyone. He would have extra benefits if he could afford to take his family on vacations that he could not have afforded by being a cashier. He would also have more friends and enjoy talking about his job. The extra rewards would be that he would be able to tell the cashier who worked under him what to do and how to do it, he would make some decisions which he could not make a being a cashier which was one of his favorite job that he had ever known.

### Input Response-Answer:He was good at the traditional science but excelled in social science, his favorite part of the course was what? Choices

Answer: He excelled in studying social sciences, his favorite part of that class was the social studies unit.
